body_html:
@zdevito sorry about the formatting and confusion caused by that.

The major changes are the following:

  • adding getNextRecord methods in both PyTorchStreamWriter and PyTorchFileWriter. So we can read the file sequentially. (We still keep the model data as the last record)
  • adding one test case in inline_container_test.cc to cover the major functions in inline_container.h

I will split inline_container.h in another PR.

body:
@zdevito sorry about the formatting and confusion caused by that.

The major changes are the following:
- adding `getNextRecord` methods in both PyTorchStreamWriter and PyTorchFileWriter. So we can read the file sequentially. (We still keep the model data as the last record)
- adding one test case in `inline_container_test.cc` to cover the major functions in `inline_container.h`

I will split `inline_container.h` in another PR.
